title: (x) OBEY Shepard Fairey book cover - Solstice {Yves}
content:
Anybody know what typeface this is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120717202525im_/http:/typophile.com/files/obey_cov_3933.jpg)
author: chiranit

comments.content: That's a classic T-26 face, but it seems two weeks of vacation have seriously affected my type name remembering skillz... :^/

I'll look it up on T-26 site.  
Thanks!
[Solstice](http://web.archive.org/web/20120717202525/http:/www.t26.com/fonts/display.php?f_id=749) it is. I really like that one.

Just bought Solstice.  
T-26 should thank you, Yves. (-:
